uk.co.kring

Class Waiter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.kring.Waiter

  • public class Waiter
extends java.lang.Object
    A waiter for returning a print stream continuation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ERR_PIPE 
      static java.lang.String ERR_STREAM 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Waiter bind()
      Get a bound waiter for the output stream piped into the input stream returned by getting a print waiter.
      static void drainAndClose(java.io.InputStream in)
      Drain and close an input stream.
      java.io.PrintStream getPrintStream()
      Gets the print stream from the waiter after waiting on the bound thread finishing.
      static java.io.InputStream getPrintWaiter(java.lang.Thread thread, int id)
      Used to get a stream to use as output which can then later be resolved to an input.

      Gets the id bound within the waiter if any.

      Test to see if starting a transaction is a good idea.

    • Method Detail

      • getPrintStream

        public java.io.PrintStream getPrintStream()
        Gets the print stream from the waiter after waiting on the bound thread finishing.
        Returns:
        the print stream.

      • getProcessID

        public int getProcessID()
        Gets the id bound within the waiter if any.
        Returns:
        the id or zero.

      • bind

        public static Waiter bind()
        Get a bound waiter for the output stream piped into the input stream returned by getting a print waiter.
        Returns:
        the waiter.

      • getPrintWaiter

        public static java.io.InputStream getPrintWaiter(java.lang.Thread thread,
                                                 int id)
        Used to get a stream to use as output which can then later be resolved to an input. The stream supports auto close after the thread finishes.
        Parameters:
        thread - is the thread to execute using the stream.
        id - is the id to extract for use in the thread.
        Returns:
        the input stream from the print stream.

      • stream

        public static Waiter stream(java.io.InputStream i,
                            java.io.PrintStream o)
        A threaded utility to copy an input stream to an output stream.
        Parameters:
        i - input stream.
        o - output stream.
        Returns:
        the output stream waiter to chain into other processes.

      • drainAndClose

        public static void drainAndClose(java.io.InputStream in)
        Drain and close an input stream.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream.

      • startTransaction

        public boolean startTransaction()
        Test to see if starting a transaction is a good idea.
        Returns:
        true if commit is necessary as a block free of IO problems.
